message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get closer to the value you have in mind.
Bob, I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,900? I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price would be a good compromise for both of us.
